com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter

Class ConvUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.ConvUtil

  • public class ConvUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides helper functions to convert items using templates:
    • Helper functions to access properties/variables which are common to all input items.
    • Helper functions to serialize template tags and attributes.
    Author:
    zim

    • Method Detail

      • addAllAttributes

        public static void addAllAttributes(java.util.Map attrs,
                                    java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Helper function to serialize template tags:
        Adds the specified attributes to the specified buffer. The attributes must be passed as a collection of name/value pairs.
        Parameters:
        name - the attributes as a collection of name/value pairs.
        sb - the buffer to add the attributes

      • addAttribute

        public static void addAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String value,
                                java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Helper function to serialize template tags:
        Adds the specified name and value as an attribute to the specified buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - the attributes name
        value - the attributes value
        sb - the buffer to add the attributes

      • addCloseTag

        public static void addCloseTag(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Helper function to serialize template tags:
        Adds a close tag (">") to the specified buffer.
        Parameters:
        sb - the buffer to add the close tag

      • addEndTag

        public static void addEndTag(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Helper function to serialize template tags:
        Adds the start tag for an element with the specified name to the specified buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - the tag name
        sb - the buffer to add the end tag

      • addStartTag

        public static void addStartTag(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
        Helper function to serialize template tags:
        Adds the start tag for an element with the specified name to the specified buffer. The tag is not closed. Use method addCloseTag() to do so.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tag
        sb - the buffer to add the tag

      • convertLength

        public static int convertLength(java.util.Map attrs,
                                MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Resolves the "length" attribute value for a layout control.
        Parameters:
        attrs - the attribute values available in the current conversion
        logger - the logger instance
        Returns:
        the resolved value for the length attribute

      • convertWidth

        public static int convertWidth(int width,
                               int minwidth,
                               int widthfactor)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Computes the width attribute value from the specified width, minwidth and widthfactor values.

        width * widthfactor if this value is > minwidth
        or
        minwidth
        Parameters:
        width -
        minwidth -
        widthfactor -
        Returns:

      • convertWidth

        public static int convertWidth(java.util.Map attrs,
                               MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Resolves the "width" attribute value for a layout control.
        Parameters:
        attrs - the attribute values available in the current conversion
        logger - the logger instance
        Returns:
        the resolved value for the width attribute

      • convertWidth

        public static int convertWidth(java.util.Map attrs,
                               MapconverterLogger logger,
                               boolean bParseName)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Resolves the "width" attribute value for a layout control.
        Parameters:
        attrs - the attribute values available in the current conversion
        logger - the logger instance
        bParseName - TODO
        Returns:
        the resolved value for the width attribute

      • getMinWidth

        public static int getMinWidth(java.util.Map varmap,
                              MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Returns the value of the "$$minwidth$$" variable if it exists in the specified variable map. Otherwise it returns a default value.
        Parameters:
        varmap - the variable map containing name/value pairs.
        logger - the logger
        Returns:
        the minwidth value from the variable map or a corresponding default value

      • getWidth

        public static int getWidth(java.util.Map varmap,
                           MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Returns the value of the "$$width$$" variable if it exists in the specified variable map. Otherwise it returns a default value.
        Parameters:
        varmap - the variable map containing name/value pairs.
        logger - the logger
        Returns:
        the width value from the variable map or a corresponding default value

      • getWidthFactor

        public static int getWidthFactor(java.util.Map varmap,
                                 MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Returns the value of the "$$widthfactor$$" variable if it exists in the specified variable map. Otherwise it returns a default value.
        Parameters:
        varmap - the variable map containing name/value pairs.
        logger - the logger
        Returns:
        the widthfactor value from the variable map or a corresponding default value

      • getWidthFactor2

        public static int getWidthFactor2(java.util.Map varmap,
                                  MapconverterLogger logger)
        Helper function to access global properties and variables.
        Returns the value of the "$$widthfactor2$$" variable if it exists in the specified variable map. Otherwise it returns the value of widthfactor.
        Parameters:
        varmap - the variable map containing name/value pairs.
        logger - the logger
        Returns:
        the widthfactor2 value from the variable map or a corresponding default value
